modules.description: Provides functions to define API endpoints with OpenAPI compliance, generate JSON schema definitions, and serve interactive documentation. Works with route definitions, JSON schema structures, and OpenAPI specification objects. Used to build RESTful APIs with automatic documentation and schema validation.

Provides functions to generate JSON schema representations from OCaml type declarations, including mapping type names to schema identifiers, titles, and references, and constructing schema expressions for core types, row fields, and constructors. Works with OCaml AST structures, type declarations, and attributes, producing schema expressions compatible with JSON schema standards. Used to automatically derive JSON schema definitions from OCaml types during ppx processing.
